argumentText:
ARGUMENT
m n

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( n = 1 -> ( R ^r n ) = ( R ^r 1 ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( n = 1 -> dom ( R ^r n ) = dom ( R ^r 1 ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_sseq1d | |- ( n = 1 -> ( dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R <-> dom ( R ^r 1 ) C_ dom R ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( n = 1 -> ( ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R ) <-> ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r 1 ) C_ dom R ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( n = m -> ( R ^r n ) = ( R ^r m ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( n = m -> dom ( R ^r n ) = dom ( R ^r m ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_sseq1d | |- ( n = m -> ( dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R <-> dom ( R ^r m ) C_ dom R ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( n = m -> ( ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R ) <-> ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r m ) C_ dom R ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( n = ( m + 1 ) -> ( R ^r n ) = ( R ^r ( m + 1 ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( n = ( m + 1 ) -> dom ( R ^r n ) = dom ( R ^r ( m + 1 ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_sseq1d | |- ( n = ( m + 1 ) -> ( dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R <-> dom ( R ^r ( m + 1 ) ) C_ dom R ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( n = ( m + 1 ) -> ( ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R ) <-> ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r ( m + 1 ) ) C_ dom R ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( n = N -> ( R ^r n ) = ( R ^r N ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( n = N -> dom ( R ^r n ) = dom ( R ^r N ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_sseq1d | |- ( n = N -> ( dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R <-> dom ( R ^r N ) C_ dom R ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_imbi2d | |- ( n = N -> ( ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r n ) C_ dom R ) <-> ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r N ) C_ dom R ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_relexp1g | |- ( R e. V -> ( R ^r 1 ) = R ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r 1 ) = dom R ) |
| 19 |  | #P_eqimss | |- ( dom ( R ^r 1 ) = dom R -> dom ( R ^r 1 ) C_ dom R ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. V -> dom ( R ^r 1 ) C_ dom R ) |
| 21 |  | #P_relexpsucnnr | |- ( ( R e. V /\ m e. NN ) -> ( R ^r ( m + 1 ) ) = ( ( R ^r m ) o. R ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( m e. NN /\ R e. V ) -> ( R ^r ( m + 1 ) ) = ( ( R ^r m ) o. R ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( ( m e. NN /\ R e. V ) -> dom ( R ^r ( m + 1 ) ) = dom ( ( R ^r m ) o. R ) ) |
| 24 |  | #P_dmcoss | |- dom ( ( R ^r m ) o. R ) C_ dom R |
